page.title: 02OCCUPATIONS.
page.content: Most people's parents work in and around the area. More mam's work in Durham than anywhere else.The dad's work in more varied places such as {Sunderland,Berwick and Newcastle.Some dad's are miners and others drive trucks.Some dad's don't work at all neither do some of the mam's.A few of the parents work in shops as well as programming computers.Not a lot of mam's do cleaning jobs.There is just one person whose parents do a totally different job to anybody in the class.His mam works in the 'Zebra company'and his dad works at 'Mono Containers'.One person's dad is a teacher at Durham Johnston's.
